name: Bidaoui Couscous
steps: Prepare the couscous: fluff it, salt it, sprinkle with water, let it rest. Fluff again, add olive oil, mix. Place the semolina in the steamer basket for the first steam cooking.
Prepare the broth: cook the meat with the chickpeas, onions, tomatoes, and spices (Ras el Hanout, ginger, turmeric, etc.) in the couscoussier pot (bottom). Cover and let simmer.
Add the hard vegetables (turnips, carrots, cabbage) to the meat and broth.
Repeat the semolina process (sprinkling, fluffing) two more times, steaming for 15 minutes each time.
Cook the red squash and sweet potatoes separately with a bit of broth.
Check the cooking of the meat and vegetables.
Presentation: Arrange the couscous in a cone shape, create a crater, place the meat and vegetables inside. Drizzle with broth. Serve the extra broth on the side.
